mapper.insert: insert into order (id, user_name, user_id, good_id, car_id, phone, destination, order_describe, price, count) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update order set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, good_id = #{goodId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, destination = #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_describe = #{describe,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, user_id, good_id, car_id, phone, destination, order_describe, price, count from order where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, user_name, user_id, good_id, car_id, phone, destination, order_describe, price, count from order
